channel.title: Does anyone know Andela.com?
channel.description:
does anyone know this company: https://andela.com/what-we-do/ ?
they are a VC funded outsourcing company for African developers I think the story there is in the education and selection of talent. Seems they've build some tech around that. Found them in the playfair capital portfolio.

item.title: Does anyone know Andela.com?
item.dc:creator: @gabriel Gabriel
item.description:
@gabriel wrote:

Andela is well known, over here in Nigeria. Perhaps because it was started here in Lagos, by it’s co-founder Iyin and Jeremy. Great job those guys are doing. They are currently taking only female fellows in the present batch.

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know Andela.com?
item.dc:creator: @michaelfdavid Michael David
item.description:
@michaelfdavid wrote:

Yes Andela Kenya http://kenya.andela.com/ . Unfortunately, I was late to apply for their Cohort XI which closed applications on 6th October. What next to late aspiring founders?

Read full topic
